Name: Peace Maker VR
About the game: Peacemaker is an addictive VR game inspired by gun shooting games. It is easy and minimizes motion sickness and is designed to be enjoyed by all ages. This is the story of the near impossible struggle to protect the property of mankind from monsters aiming for transport materials. Players receive a quest to transport supplies to an outpost close to the monster area. You must go to the outpost by protecting the property of mankind safely in the fight against the monsters who try to interfere with the transport mission. Transporting property safely depends only on the player's abilities. Use the guns and spells given to you in both hands to complete the mission! Punish monsters for your supplies in this thrilling shooter action game! You will become a peacemaker who overcomes the obstacles of monsters and protects mankind. Complete transport missions and survive to earn huge rewards. Experience the opportunity to feel the fun of wealth and fame and power that grows stronger now!
